title: God's People
description: Climate change has arrived far quicker than anyone feared, and has forced world powers to take drastic action to ensure their (and our) survival. But at what price? And is it sustainable moving forward? An ambitious young civil servant is tasked with investigating just that. What he uncovers forces him to face some uncomfortable truths about himself and wider society. Will he make the right choice?
author: Jovan Autonomašević
